医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:32 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
糖尿病药物有望减少饮酒由诺丁汉大学专家领导的新研究发现，某些用于治疗糖尿病的药物可能有效减少饮酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Diabetes-medication-shows-promise-in-reducing-alcohol-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Diabetes-medication-shows-promise-in-reducing-alcohol-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44df1559-cb54-4c14-bb0d-dc03a7c20ef0 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:55:38 -0500 Diabetes medication shows promise in reducing alcohol use
UT Health San Antonio 获得研究和临床医学全球最高排名吸引最优秀和最聪明的学生的竞赛已经成为一场国际竞赛，候选人不仅在自己的州或国家，而且在全球范围内权衡选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/UT-Health-San-Antonio-achieves-top-global-ranking-for-research-and-clinical-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/UT-Health-San-Antonio-achieves-top-global-ranking-for-research-and-clinical-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=beb23438-d96f-4f30-9007-e2afe468ee0c Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:36:00 -0500 UT Health San Antonio achieves top global ranking for research and clinical medicine
最大的基于 ALS 患者的 iPSC 存储库开辟了研究新领域在一项具有里程碑意义的持续合作中，Answer ALS 和 Cedars-Sinai 宣布完成最大的基于肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者的诱导多能干细胞 (iPSC) 和生物数据存储库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Largest-ALS-patent-based-iPSC-repository-opens-new-frontiers-in-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Largest-ALS-patent-based-iPSC-repository-opens-new-frontiers-in-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70de19cb-ab16-4251-9d2c-711d412ac6a2 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:15:25 -0500 Largest ALS patient-based iPSC repository opens new frontiers in research
自 1990 年以来，全球糖尿病患病率和治疗差距不断扩大全球糖尿病发病率激增，尤其是在资源匮乏地区，这暴露了治疗获取方面的严重差距，并凸显了改善护理的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Global-gap-in-diabetes-prevalence-and-treatment-has-widened-since-1990.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Global-gap-in-diabetes-prevalence-and-treatment-has-widened-since-1990.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=659d6759-645b-4ebc-b855-9eab709693f9 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 07:58:00 -0500 Global gap in diabetes prevalence and treatment has widened since 1990
我们肠道中的微生物密度决定了疾病与肠道健康的关系《细胞》杂志上的这项研究强调了微生物负荷在肠道微生物组变异中的作用，表明它是疾病研究中的混杂因素和关键的健康决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Microbial-densis-in-our-gut-shapes-how-diseases-are-linked-to-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Microbial-densis-in-our-gut-shapes-how-diseases-are-linked-to-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f773872a-cb03-4bef-98ff-7ab0397b3f40 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 07:27:00 -0500 Microbial density in our gut shapes how diseases are linked to gut health
空气污染与头颈癌风险相关PM2.5 水平升高与头颈癌风险升高相关，特别是在弱势社区，这凸显了紧急的公共卫生措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Air-pollution-linked-to-head-and-neck-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Air-pollution-linked-to-head-and-neck-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dca278c5-07b4-42b9-8f69-b14671210b05 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 06:11:00 -0500 Air pollution linked to head and neck cancer risk
认知行为疗法显示出治疗长期悲伤障碍的希望综合认知行为疗法在减轻治疗后悲伤严重程度和合并症症状方面比以当下为中心的疗法更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-shows-promise-for-prolonged-grief-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-shows-promise-for-prolonged-grief-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c2ce6ff-434b-453d-a108-af9433274769 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 05:30:00 -0500 Cognitive behavioral therapy shows promise for prolonged grief disorder
绿色空间的不平等与城市地区可预防的死亡有关调查结果显示，贫困社区中更多的绿色空间与较低的死亡率相关，因此提倡采取战略性公共卫生举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Inequalities-in-green-space-linked-to-preventable-deaths-in-urban-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Inequalities-in-green-space-linked-to-preventable-deaths-in-urban-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d473d8b-0500-486d-8316-d6cf619b7c72 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 04:55:00 -0500 Inequalities in green space linked to preventable deaths in urban areas
研究人员发现影响视网膜细胞剪接过程的机制基因包含生命的基本构建指令，指导细胞以何种顺序组装哪些氨基酸以产生特定的蛋白质。人类基因组编码了大约 20,000 个这样的指令。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-mechanism-affecting-splicing-process-in-retinal-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-mechanism-affecting-splicing-process-in-retinal-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=945f841f-ec5d-4332-9662-5de8582a92cd Fri, 15 Nov 2024 01:57:00 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism affecting splicing process in retinal cells
